channel.title: How could i change the pk points needed to buy a certain item in shop?
channel.description: i need help to change the pk points needed to buy a certain item inside the pk shop.... please help me. thanks you

item.title: How could i change the pk points needed to buy a certain item in shop?
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

[quote=“pildurass, post:4, topic:393431”]Go into character files. Find your character and scroll down a bit in your files or jst hit ctrl+f and search “pk” there should be something called pkpoints.
Example: Player pkpoints = 0
to get max do this:: Player pkpoints = 999999
hope this solves your problem =][/quote]
One thats stupid, thats changing his player pk points. And back to topic go to ShopAssist.java and then find the case your item id it will be in a list with other id’s at the end you will see “return how much it is;” just change the how much. heres an example for if you wanna do just one item

Befor:

Case 15667 Case 15668 Return 50;
After:

Case 15667 Return 25; Case 15668 Return 50;

Also make sure your not cutting anything off… for example
Befor:Case 15667 Case 15668 Case 15669 Return 82;
After:Case 15667 Case 15668 <--- Your cutting the one on top off and it will be 50. return 50; Case 15669 return 80;

Also if you wanna just make it faster instead of cutting all them off
Befor:Case 15667 Case 15668 Case 15669 Case 15670 Return 92;

After:Case 15667 Case 15668 <--- now your making the above case 15667 worth 50. return 50; Case 15669 <---here is were you cut the top off return 25; Case 15670 return 52;

Read full topic
item.source: How could i change the pk points needed to buy a certain item in shop?

item.title: How could i change the pk points needed to buy a certain item in shop?
item.dc:creator: @pildurass pildurass
item.description:
@pildurass wrote:

Go into character files. Find your character and scroll down a bit in your files or jst hit ctrl+f and search “pk” there should be something called pkpoints.
Example: Player pkpoints = 0
to get max do this:: Player pkpoints = 999999
hope this solves your problem =]

Read full topic
